description.en:
BollyCoin was created to bring a large portion of all existing iconic Bollywood media onto the blockchain and allow community interests in such media through tokens.

We’re directly partnering with the owners [production houses and licensors] of original Bollywood media, adding them to the blockchain and turning them into NFTs. These NFTs would be subsequently sold on our platform. For example, an NFT of a scene from an iconic movie that millions of people love.
